title: SCTIMST Recruitment 2025 - Walk-in interview for Project Technical Support- II Posts
description: The Sree Chitra Tirunal Institute for Medical Sciences and Technology (SCTIMST) has officially released the notification to fill the vacancies of 01 Project Technical Support-II Posts. Interested and eligibile candidates can use this opportunity to apply for these posts before the last date of application. Candidates who have completed their 12th, Diploma in Electrical, Electronics, and Mechanical Engineering can apply for the SCTIMST Recruitment 2025 . The interested applicants can attend th...
